channel.title: Custom npc (no arms?)
channel.description:
hey i am trying to add this npc. worked well until i logged on and saw... no arms:(
what do i do? i really want a npc with either bcp or tassets. but those models dont have any arms ?
Please help guys :)
[code]case 2589: stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630]; entityDef.aByte68 = 1; // Distance it stands from u entityDef.itemActions = new String[5]; // Actions for the npc entityDef.itemActions[1] = "Attack"; //First option entityDef.anIntArray94 = new int[9]; //Number of models it uses entityDef.anIntArray94[0] = 27732; /*Npc's Plate*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[1] = 27739; /*Npc's Legs*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[2] = 13307; /*Npc's Gloves*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[3] = 27754; /*Npc's Boots*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[4] = 5409; /*Npc's Weapon*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[5] = 21873; /*Npcs's Helmet*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[6] = 62367; /*Npcs's Shield*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[7] = 9642; /*Npcs's Amulet*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[8] = 9638; /*Npcs's Cape*/ entityDef.combatLevel = 138; //combat level entityDef.name = ""; //name break;[/code] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/30mo2om.png[/img]

item.title: Custom npc (no arms?)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So I noticed in your code you have some comments on your code…
And… Well. read the comments.
You’ve got every slot defined besides the arms.
0 (default value of an integer) may not be a valid model id for the npc’s arms.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom npc (no arms?)
item.dc:creator: @Quintorz Quintorz
item.description:
@Quintorz wrote:

[quote=“mrpopyman, post:2, topic:547945”]For the body, try the item id 11724 (that’s a bandos chestplate on my server, anyway).

Dunno if it’ll work or not, but it’s worth a shot.[/quote]

You do not put the itemId in any slots in the client. atleast not when doin this.
u use the modelId

Read full topic

item.title: Custom npc (no arms?)
item.dc:creator: @Quintorz Quintorz
item.description:
@Quintorz wrote:

Does it work with other types of armour?

platebodies yes (armours the covers up the arms)

Read full topic

item.title: Custom npc (no arms?)
item.dc:creator: @Quintorz Quintorz
item.description:
@Quintorz wrote:

hey i am trying to add this npc. worked well until i logged on and saw… no arms:(

what do i do? i really want a npc with either bcp or tassets. but those models dont have any arms ?

Please help guys

case 2589: stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630]; entityDef.aByte68 = 1; // Distance it stands from u entityDef.itemActions = new String[5]; // Actions for the npc entityDef.itemActions[1] = "Attack"; //First option entityDef.anIntArray94 = new int[9]; //Number of models it uses entityDef.anIntArray94[0] = 27732; /*Npc's Plate*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[1] = 27739; /*Npc's Legs*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[2] = 13307; /*Npc's Gloves*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[3] = 27754; /*Npc's Boots*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[4] = 5409; /*Npc's Weapon*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[5] = 21873; /*Npcs's Helmet*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[6] = 62367; /*Npcs's Shield*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[7] = 9642; /*Npcs's Amulet*/ entityDef.anIntArray94[8] = 9638; /*Npcs's Cape*/ entityDef.combatLevel = 138; //combat level entityDef.name = ""; //name break;

Read full topic
